page.title: 05A CHILD'S DAY IN SHEERNESS
page.content: I WOKE ON TUESDAY AT 7.3O.I HAD BACON AND EGGS FOR BREAKFAST.I LEFT FOR SCHOOL AT 8.15. I GO TO SCHOOL ALONG BY THE CANAL AND THROUGH SECOND AVENUE, PAST OUR FOOTBALL GROUND AND THROUGH A GAP IN THE FENCE. FOR THE FIRST LESSON WE HAVE MENTAL MATHS,THATS AFTER ASSEMBLY. AFTER MORNING SCHOOL I HAD MY DINNER MAIN MEAL WAS FISH AND CHIPS SO I GOT THAT. AFTERNOONS ON A TUESDAY ARE NOT TOO BAD AS WE HAVE MUSIC AND P.E ,BUT WE DID HAVE R.E WHICH MADE IT RATHER BORING. ON TUESDAY I HAVE POOL CLUB,I GOT THERE AT 7.3O AND GOT A DRINK WHILE I WAS WAITING FOR A GAME.I WAS BEATEN IN THE FINALS AND GOT 5OP INSTEAD OF Â£1.OO.
